channel.title: Tmux - terminal multiplexer
channel.description:
'tmux' is a terminal multiplexer for linux. It enables you easily switch between programs running in a terminal and to use a session-based approach to manage local and remote terminals (shells).
I wholeheartedly encourage you to check this well written primer and make your terminal existence easier and, in the end, more enjoyable =)
https://danielmiessler.com/study/tmux
To check out tmux' original docs, check out
https://tmux.github.io

item.title: Tmux - terminal multiplexer
item.dc:creator: ivlb
item.description:
‘tmux’ is a terminal multiplexer for linux. It enables you easily switch between programs running in a terminal and to use a session-based approach to manage local and remote terminals (shells).

I wholeheartedly encourage you to check this well written primer and make your terminal existence easier and, in the end, more enjoyable =)

Daniel Miessler

Tactical tmux: The 10 Most Important Commands | Daniel Miessler

Shows you how to install and use Tmux in the shortest time possible, from installation to creating and managing sessions…

To check out tmux’ original docs, check out

https://tmux.github.io

Read full topic
